content:
I'm glad I could help!

And don't worry, I've got you covered! I'll remind you to pack your belt. In fact, I'll remind you to double-check your entire packing list to ensure you don't forget anything important.

Here's a quick summary of our conversation:

* Suit: Navy blue or charcoal gray, two-button or three-button, slim-fit or modern fit
* Dress shirt: White or light blue, point collar, French cuffs, Oxford weave
* Tie: Navy blue, simple stripe pattern, four-in-hand or Windsor style
* Belt: Don't forget to pack it!

Remember to check the dress code for your event and adjust your outfit accordingly. And don't hesitate to reach out if you have any more questions or need further guidance.

Safe travels to New York, and I hope you have a successful and stylish business trip!
